vpn.ovpn_desc: OpenVPN is an open-source software application that implements virtual private network (OpenVPN) techniques to create secure point-to-point or site-to-site connections in routed or bridged configurations and remote access facilities. Please follow the steps below:
vpn.ovpn_step_tip2: 2. Modify the default configuration, then save;
vpn.ovpn_step_tip3: 3. Export the client configuration file to your client device;
vpn.ovpn_step_tip4: 4. Go to the VPN Dashboard page and start the VPN server.
vpn.ovpn_tips: You don't have any OpenVPN configuration files yet. To get started, please generate one.
vpn.wg_desc: WireGuard® is an extremely simple, fast and modern VPN that utilizes state-of-the-art cryptography. Please follow the steps below:
vpn.wg_step_tip3: 3. Copy peer information to the client;
vpn.wg_step_tip4: 4. Go to the VPN Dashboard page and start the VPN server.
vpn.wg_tips1: You don't have any peer configuration yet. To get started, add a peer configuration.
vpn.autodetec_desc: The routing rules defined in each VPN client configuration file or issued by the VPN server will be used.
vpn.custom_route_desc: You can manually configure routing rules for each VPN client instance.
vpn.choose_config_file_tips: You can switch the configuration file whilst the client is running; the process of switching the configuration file will not cause traffic leakage.
vpn.mtu_tips: The MTU you set for the instance will overwrite the MTU item in the configuration file.
vpn.default_metric_tips: In auto detect mode, the routing rules in the instance will write the routing table with the default metric. The smaller the metric value, the higher the priority of the routing rule.
vpn.client_starting: The client is starting, please wait…
vpn.route_rule_tips: In customize routes mode, the VPN client will ignore the configuration file and the routing configuration issued by the server. Whether the encrypted tunnel provided by the VPN is used when accessing any network segment will be determined by the routing rules you set manually.
vpn.upload_tips: Please visit $$$$ VPN on Router $$$$ to view OpenVPN compatible VPN service providers and learn about the benefits of using VPN.
vpn.upload_desc: Follow your VPN service provider's guide, download the WireGuard configuration file, and import the configuration file to the router.
vpn.rootcert_tips: The root certificate file has been parsed:
vpn.needauth_tips: $$$$ valid configuration files have been detected. Please enter the username and password. If these configurations use different passwords, you will need to enter the password individually for each configuration file:
vpn.needinfo_tips: $$$$ valid configuration files need the askpass to be provided, Please ensure that these configurations all use the same askpass:
vpn.unpassed_tips: The following $$$$ files are not valid configuration files. These will be discarded when the compressed package is confirmed:
vpn.auth_desc: The authentication information you supply here will override the authentication information provided in the configuration file.
vpn.name: Name
vpn.ovpn_init_tips: When generating the OpenVPN server configuration, the router will automatically generate some encrypted files (for example, the server root certificate) which are then used to protect your communications. If you are familiar with OpenVPN, you can also $$$$enter manually$$$$.
vpn.client_auth_tips: The router will automatically generate client and server certificates and keys; these will be written to the configuration file when it is generated.
vpn.use_ddns_export_tips: Use DDNS domain to avoid the situation where a client cannot connect to the VPN service because of a change to the public IP address provided by your ISP. If you want to activate this function, please $$$$Enable DDNS$$$$ on your router.
vpn.no_auth_tips: Username/Password authentication is not enabled, the configured username and password will not be used.
vpn.generate_peer_tips1: Please download the WireGuard® app using Google Play or the App Store; then use the app to scan the QR code to connect to your server.
vpn.generate_peer_tips2: Please copy the following configuration to your WireGuard client.
vpn.kill_switch_tips: Enable this option to block all traffic from client devices outside the VPN tunnel attempting to be sent outside of the VPN tunnel , preventing leaks from DNS settings, connection issues, or applications making IP requests. This overrides other VPN policies and rules.
vpn.policy_nav_title: When a client accesses the network with your router$$$$how do you want the router to indicate whether the traffic is using a VPN encrypted tunnel?
vpn.access_by_sites_desc: In domain name/IP mode, you can set which websites to visit with or without VPN.
vpn.access_by_dev: Differentiate by The Clients Accessing Network
vpn.access_by_dev_desc: In MAC filtering mode, you can determine whether a client in your local area network can access the Internet through the VPN by specifying the MAC address of the client.
vpn.domain_name_tips: Using the domain name in the list will also cause any subdomains to be matched (for example: using google.com will also match mail.google.com and any other google.com subdomains).
vpn.mac_exception: Exception For Traffic from Following Device
vpn.base_on_web_tips: In this mode, only the traffic of certain websites $$$$defined by IP address or domain name$$$$ can access the VPN. Only one VPN client instance can be activated.
vpn.base_on_device_tips: In this mode, only the traffic of certain local client devices $$$$defined by MAC address$$$$ can access the VPN. Only one VPN client instance can be activated.
vpn.base_on_vlan_tips: In this mode, $$$$only the traffic of certain VLAN$$$$ can access the VPN. Only one VPN client instance can be activated.
vpn.global_proxy_tips: If the VPN is connected, all traffic will be routed through the VPN. Only one VPN client instance can be activated.
vpn.set_key_manually_tips: The router will automatically generate a key pair for you. If you are familiar with WireGuard and want to update the key pair or add a pre-shared key, you can provide these keys manually.
vpn.wgserver_peer_list_desc: Each client device that connects to the WireGuard server requires a unique peer configuration. You need to create a separate configuration for each client device; each configuration must specify a unique client IP.
vpn.has_auth_tips: Username/password verification is enabled. Client devices will require username/password from the list to connect to the OpenVPN server.
vpn.peer_deprecated_tips: The configuration of the client peer is invalid because of a change in the server configuration. Please create a new peer configuration for your device.
vpn.advanced_configuration_tips: If you are familiar with OpenVPN, you can also modify advanced configuration settings manually.
vpn.users_empty_tips: The user list is empty, you must add at least one user to connect to OpenVPN server.
vpn.use_client_tips: Prefer using $$$$other VPN service providers$$$$ or $$$$customizing your own VPN server$$$$ ? Create a new group to add your configuration files.
vpn.loaction_label_tips: The router will only retrieve configuration profiles for servers located in the regions you choose. The more regions you choose, the longer it will take to get the profiles.
vpn.wg_revoke_key_tips: Failed to generate a WireGuard key. You can only have up to five keys at the same time per Mullvad account. Please go to $$$$Mullvad$$$$ to revoke a key.
vpn.local_access_tips: If this option is enabled, resources inside the LAN subnet can be accessed through the VPN tunnel.
vpn.masq_tips: If this option is enabled, When clients devices on LAN send their IP packets, the router replaces the source IP address with its own address and then forwards it to the VPN tunnel.
vpn.use_vpn_only_tips: If this option is enabled, while the VPN is connected, client devices will still be able to access WAN services, e.g. accessing your printer, NAS etc. in the upper subnet.
vpn.disable_vpn_for_services_tips: If this option is enabled, GooodCloud, DDNS, and rtty services will use VPN tunnels to send packets. Please note that normally, these services need to use the real IP address of the device, otherwise operations may fail.
vpn.nordvpn_setup_guide: It is service credentials of NordVPN. If you don't know how to get it, please see $$$$Setup Guide$$$$.
vpn.third_lead_tips: Request the VPN configuration file from your VPN service provider.
vpn.domain_required_tips: Using the current list, you must add a domain name or IP
vpn.mac_required_tips: Using the current list, you must add a device
vpn.enable_vpn_cascading_tips: If this option is enabled, when both VPN server and VPN Client are running on this router, clients connected to the VPN server will also be routed to the VPN client tunnel.
vpn.auth_conflict_tips: Configuration files in the same group must use the same authentication method. Please upload configuration files from different providers to separate groups.
vpn.file_oversize_tips: The uploaded compressed file cannot contain more than 1,000 configuration files.
vpn.unzip_fail_msg: Failed to unzip the file. Please check the file and upload again.
vpn.block_traffic_domain_filter_warning: The $$$$ option is enabled and the domain in the list cannot be resolved. It may not be valid.
vpn.rootcert_missing_tips: The certificate is missing; Please add a certificate before continuing.
vpn.rootcert_duplicate_tips: Certificate File Detected, Please Rebuild the Group.
vpn.azirevpn_account_limit_tips: An AzireVPN account may only be used on 10 devices at the same time. You have reached the maximum number of devices for your account, please go to $$$$AzireVPN$$$$, delete any devices that you are not using and try again.
vpn.remvove_public_key_label: Delete public key and private key at the same time
vpn.wgclient_clear_account_warning: Are you sure you want to delete the account credential, associated public key , private key and configuration files in the router?
vpn.ovpnclient_clear_account_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this account and profile inside the router ?
vpn.needauth_needinfo_tips: $$$$ valid configuration files need the username, password and the askpass to be provided, Please ensure that these configurations all use the same authentication information:
vpn.ovpnclinet_taps2s_disable_tips: When this feature is enabled, functions such as {feature} cannot be used.
vpn.ovpnclient_tap_s2s_close_tips: When this feature is turned off, the OpenVPN client reverts to its original IP address.
vpn.ovpnclient_tap_s2s_global_proxy_tips: TAP-S2S only works with Global Proxy Mode, it will adjust automatically with OpenVPN on.
vpn.ovpnclient_tap_s2s_ip_tips: The IP address of the OpenVPN client may change.
vpn.client_each_other_tips: This is VPN Client to VPN Client, not Site to Site.
vpn.domain_err_tips: Incorrect formatting, please change manually or $$$$one-click processing$$$$
vpn.domain_detect_success_tips: {count} domain names or IP addresses were successfully detected.
vpn.domain_detect_failed_tips: {count} domain names or IP addresses failed to be detected.
vpn.domain_url_tips: Please enter the correct URL. The URL detection will identify the correctness of the domain name or IP address.
vpn.wg_surfshark_limit_tips: You have reached the maximum number of connections, please go to {provider} to delete the connections you are not using.
vpn.wg_azirevpn_limit_tips: An AzireVPN account may only be used on 10 devices at the same time. You have reached the maximum number of devices for your account, please go to {provider}, delete any devices that you are not using and try again.
vpn.domain_input_mode_tips: You can enter the domain name or IP manually or automatically, and if you select Subscribe URL, the domain name or IP in the URL is automatically updated every day.
vpn.wg_mullvad_limit_tips: Failed to generate a WireGuard key. You can only have up to five keys at the same time per Mullvad account. Please go to {provider} to revoke a key.
vpn.wg_nordvpn_tips: NordVPN token is the credentials to login to NordVPN, you need to login to the NordVPN official website first, and then manually get its token.
vpn.wg_surfshark_not_connet_tips: If the VPN server cannot be connected, the public key may be expired. You can update the public key.
vpn.wg_guide_tips: The VPN guide can help you use the WireGuard VPN quickly. It is only for AzireVPN, Mullvad, PIA, Surfshark, NordVPN, Hideme and IPVanish. For others, you can skip. Configuring the VPN may take a few minutes.
vpn.guide_make_sure_available_tips: 1.Make sure the VPN account is available.
vpn.guide_cannot_work_tips: Now the VPN cannot work properly, please try the following ways.
vpn.guide_done_tips: {provider} has been connected successfully and you can enjoy VPN now.
vpn.guide_contact_us_tips: 4.If the problem has not been solved, you can also email {email}.
vpn.wg_not_subscription_tips: This account may not have a subscription.
vpn.wg_subscription_expired_tips: This account subscription may have expired.
vpn.ovpn_nordvpn_tips: To ensure successful usage of the VPN, kindly enter {account}, which serve as your service credentials for NordVPN.
vpn.to_setup_guide_tips: If you don't know how to get it, please see {guide}.
vpn.accurate_account_label: the accurate NordVPN username and password
vpn.wg_guide_disabled_tips: OpenVPN is connected, turn off OpenVPN if you need to use Wireguard VPN.

vpn_err.no_execute_program_msg: no execute program, maybe not install
vpn_err.no_openssl_tool_msg: no openssl tool, maybe not install
vpn_err.conflicts_with_local_addr_v4_msg: the target address conflicts with local IPv4 address
vpn_err.conflicts_with_local_addr_v6_msg: the target address conflicts with local IPv6 address
vpn_err.username_has_been_token_msg: the username has already been taken
vpn_err.get_provider_token_fail_msg: get third part provider token fail
vpn_err.country_count_zero_msg: the number of servers in the selected country is zero
vpn_err.password_too_short_msg: the password must be at least 8 characters
vpn_err.invalid_username_msg: the username may only contain letters and numbers
vpn_err.vpn_client_connect_fail_msg: vpn client failed to connect to server
vpn_err.connect_server_fail_msg: get information from provider server failed
